title: Schaeffler to deploy hundreds of Humanoid robots in its factories
description:
Schaeffler will provide actuators for Humanoid's systems, which will be available through a robotics-as-a-service model.

The post Schaeffler to deploy hundreds of Humanoid robots in its factories appeared first on The Robot Report.
